Rakwon

Korean: 락원

Hometown:

Seocho-dong, Seocho-gu

Seok Rakwon

Age:
21 years old
Blood type:
A
Height:
5'9" (174 cm)
Group (2022-present):
ATBO until May 6, 2024

Introduction

Seok Rakwon is a former member of the South Korean boy group ATBO under IST Entertainment. He was a contestant on “THE ORIGIN – A, B, OR What?” and debuted with ATBO by placing third place with a total of 1520 points.

On May 6, 2024, IST Entertainment announced that Rakwon would be leaving ATBO due to health reasons.
